### SCENE 02 ‚Äì Morning at Hero‚Äôs House  

_Location: Hero home ‚Äî camera follows Gayatri from downstairs to the entrance._

_Gayatri knocks; Hero is still sleeping üõè üò¥ üí§_

**Gayatri:** Rey‚Ä¶ Annaya‚Ä¶  

> VOICE (background ‚Äì Oppo Reno 2 jingle): **General ga naku alarms nacchavandi‚Ä¶ natural ga levadam antene istam, anduke roju twaraga 10 ki legustha.**

_Hero opens his eyes, checks phone ‚Äî **10:20**. Rushes to bathroom, toothbrush foam everywhere. Calls friend._

**Hero:** 5 min lo unta‚Ä¶ bike tho ready ga undu‚Ä¶  
**H Friend:** Rey, manaki **sem holidays** ra‚Ä¶  
**Hero:** Oh..!  
**H Friend:** Adhi kadhu gaani‚Äî!  

_Cuts the call, throws brush, flops back on bed (foam still in mouth)._

_After some time (**12:13**) Hero comes downstairs for water üíß; mood serious. He winks at Gayatri (Tom-and-Jerry sting) and heads back up. Gayatri follows._

**Gayatri:** Annaya‚Ä¶  
_Hero turns._

**Hero:** Yes‚Ä¶?  
**Gayatri:** Eroju **nee results** ra‚Ä¶  
_Hero slips on the floor._

**Hero:** Oh..! (looks downstairs) Na kosamena mounam paatistunnaru‚Ä¶ Subjects yemyna poyaya?  
**Gayatri:** ü§®  
**Hero:** (gasps) Enni pass ayya?  
**Gayatri:** ü§®  
**Hero:** Kaneesam **Drawing** aina‚Ä¶?  
**Gayatri:** Mm-hm‚Ä¶ **Ledhu**.  

_Hero gets thoroughly scolded._

> VOICE (background): Ee thitlu kottha em kadhu‚Ä¶ kaani ee sari kottha-kottha thitlu vinnanu. But sometimes you need to be shameless in life üòâ. Kaani edhi aythe adhi ayyindi ani aa roju open aipoya.

**Hero:** Nenu **director avudhamani** anukuntunna‚Ä¶  

_Hero‚Äôs mother drops a vessel._  

**Hero:** Naku **1 year** time kavali. (softly) Passion, aim rendu veru ani‚Ä¶ kaani na passion-inka-aim rendu okate‚Ä¶  

_Silence. Father and mother walk away._

### SCENE 26 ‚Äì Awkward Coffee-Shop Meetup  

_Coffee shop. Heroine, Hero, a random girl, and Ash sit; Hero arrives late._

**Hero:** Hello everyone!  
**Heroine:** BTW, *tinu*‚Äîna friend **Sneha**.  
_Shake hands._

**Girl (Sneha):** Ippativarku mee gurinchi cheptundi. Asalu ela start aindhi? Eppudu kalisaru? Evaru first propose chesaru? _(raises brows)_  
**Aman (inner):** Cheppindhi annav kadha‚Ä¶  
**Heroine:** *Tane* propose chesadu.  
**Girl:** Eppudu kalisaru? What‚Äôs the magical date?  
**Heroine:** Cheppu‚Ä¶  

_Hero, hand on table, straightens, looks at Girl and Aman, nods._

**Aman (inner):** Ee details anni telusukoni jathakalu chusatadha enti? Book aipoyina·π≠·π≠u unnade‚Ä¶  
**Heroine (intense):** Gurthuleda?  
**Aman:** Ikkada‚Ä¶ _(searches)_ aquarium lo *rangu-rangula* chepalu untayi, telusa?  
**Heroine:** Aman‚Ä¶ please.  
**Hero (inner):** Rangu‚Äêrangula chepala‚Ä¶ rangulu, rangulu ante Holi. Ala antav enti? Actual-ga Holi-roju chusa, kani matladindhi next-day kadha‚Äîaa roju chepdama ani‚Ä¶  
**Girl:** Oh, sweet!  
**Heroine:** Sorryyy‚Äî*marchipoyav* annukunna.  
**Hero:** Marchipovadama? Aina adhi ela marchipotha, cheppu.  
**Aman:** _(looks up guiltily)_  

_Attharintiki Daaredhi climax-music swell; hand-hold moment._

**Sneha:** You know, long-distance relationships general-ga workout avavu‚Äîbut nuvvu oppukunnavu ante‚Ä¶ great asalu. *Maya* U.S.-lo, nuvvu ikkada‚Äîkastam kadha‚Ä¶  
_Faces react._

**Hero:** Naku enduku cheppaledhu?  
**Maya:** Arjun‚Ä¶ adhi‚Ä¶ cheppadam anukunnanu‚Ä¶  
**Aman:** *Shit*‚Ä¶ _(whispers)_ Flight‚Ä¶ _(eyes widen)_  
**Maya:** Inko two days lo‚Ä¶  
_Arjun rises abruptly; Aman stays seated, Maya follows Hero._

### SCENE 10 ‚Äì Niha Visits Hero‚Äôs Room  

_Hero walks out; Niha enters, looks around. Hero re-enters._

**Niha:** Ou‚Ä¶! Hello.  
**Arjun:** Hi‚Ä¶!  
**Niha:** Shwetha rammannadhi‚Ä¶  
**Arjun:** Hmm‚Äîtanadhi pakka room.  
**Niha:** Oh‚Ä¶ _starts to leave_  
**Arjun:** Aina‚Ä¶ chelli intlo ledhu‚Ä¶  
**Niha:** Avna? _checks phone_ Call chesindi‚Äîrammani‚Ä¶ _low voice_  
**Arjun:** Yeah‚Ä¶ vacchestadhi. _gestures_ Please‚Ä¶  
_Niha sits on the bed; Arjun grabs a chair. She notices stacks of papers._
